entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Code refactor proposal] Split/merge multiple attributes into/from separate attribute lists #75411
  • Bring back MetadataReference.CreateFromAssembly #75409
  • IntelliCode suggestion stuck and never goes away #75408

PullRequests

Updated

  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #75406
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
